Coordinate any internal auditor reviews.^parent={{e04a5245-b83b-451e-a5ed-4ff7ee1896f5.Record}}^assignment_group={"display":"IT - GRC","value":"71430120db1bf7802f2d65494b9619e7","sys_id":"71430120db1bf7802f2d65494b9619e7"}^due_date=fd-scripted^uar_type=workday

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Workday_UAR_Reviewers@neogenomics.onmicrosoft.com, IT-GRC, and SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly User Access Review (UAR) for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by the 15th (last month of every quarter) using the reports provided in SharePoint “Workday Reviews”. UAR instructions can be viewed here.

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Post a message to the Teams Channel SNOW UAR Testing

^due_date=fd-scripted^assignment_group={"display":"SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR","value":"4116303e1b92795092cc75dcdc4bcb92","sys_id":"4116303e1b92795092cc75dcdc4bcb92"}^uar_type=workday

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Post a message to the Teams Channel SNOW UAR Testing
Subject: Quarterly Workday User Access Review

sys_variable_value.value: Subject: Quarterly Workday User Access Review

Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory Quarterly SOX User Access Review (UAR) for the Workday application. Please complete the below tasks by the targeted deadlines:

  • Upload all reports by the 1st (last month of every quarter).
  • Complete the review process with reviewers by the 15th.
  • Complete UAR workbooks by the 22nd.
  • Complete QA by the 27th.
  • Complete management review by the last day of the quarter.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

 

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Trent Hein, Greg Aunan, and GRC for final review

sys_variable_value.value: UAR workbook is ready for final management review

Hello all,

 

The UAR workbook is ready for your final management review. Once reviewed, please notify GRC by the end of the quarter.

 

Here is the SharePoint link to access the completed workbook:

 

https://neogenomics.sharepoint.com/sites/NEOFinancialSystems/Quarterly%20SOX%20Reviews/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FNEOFinancialSystems%2FQuarterly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FQtrly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FCompleted%20Workbooks&viewid=52b37d2a%2D32dd%2D45f6%2D8f6b%2Dfcfc1593be20

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Complete Workday UAR SOX Workbook. Assigned to SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Send to Workday_UAR_Reviewers@neogenomics.onmicrosoft.com, IT-GRC, and SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory quarterly User Access Review (UAR) for the Workday application. Please provide your review input by the 15th (last month of every quarter) using the reports provided in SharePoint “Workday Reviews”. UAR instructions can be viewed here.

Thank you,

GRC Team

grc@neogenomics.com

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Complete Workday UAR SOX Workbook. Assigned to SNOW_WORKDAY_HR_UAR

Send to Trent Hein, Greg Aunan, and GRC for final review

sys_variable_value.value: UAR workbook is ready for final management review

Hello all,

 

The UAR workbook is ready for your final management review. Once reviewed, please notify GRC by the end of the quarter.

 

Here is the SharePoint link to access the completed workbook:

 

https://neogenomics.sharepoint.com/sites/NEOFinancialSystems/Quarterly%20SOX%20Reviews/Forms/AllItems.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FNEOFinancialSystems%2FQuarterly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FQtrly%20SOX%20Reviews%2FCompleted%20Workbooks&viewid=52b37d2a%2D32dd%2D45f6%2D8f6b%2Dfcfc1593be20

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Create Parent UAR ticket - IT GRC
Subject: Quarterly Workday User Access Review

sys_variable_value.value:
Hello all,

It is time for the mandatory Quarterly SOX User Access Review (UAR) for the Workday application. Please complete the below tasks by the targeted deadlines:

  • Upload all reports by the 1st (last month of every quarter).
  • Complete the review process with reviewers by the 15th.
  • Complete UAR workbooks by the 22nd.
  • Complete QA by the 27th.
  • Complete management review by the last day of the quarter.

 

Thank you,

GRC Team

 

grc@neogenomics.com
Subject: Quarterly Workday User Access Review
